title: Drugs: it's up to you really
creator_credit: Geoffrey Nottage, Nicholas Cockram, Lesley Hammond, South Australian Film Corporation and Telefeatures
brief_description: Groups of students talk about their own experiences with drugs, their attitudes towards drugs and the influences upon them to take various drugs especially cigarettes, alcohol and analgesics. Suitable for lower and middle secondary levels.
creator_credit_for_label: Geoffrey Nottage, Nicholas Cockram, Lesley Hammond, South Australian Film Corporation and Telefeatures
